noActiveEntry.en: Hey {name}, you don't have an active journal entry yet. Let's create one first!

entryNotFound.en: Hmm, I can't seem to find your journal entry. Let's start fresh!

questionsToThinkAbout.en: I've been thinking about what you shared, {name}... ü§î Questions to ponder: {questions}

shareThoughts.en: Feel free to share your thoughts on these questions, or we can wrap up whenever you're ready!
